definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Job 15:14 man, mankind, mostly poet. (18 t. Jb, 13 t. Psalm, etc.) (Ar. 0’una0sun (coll.), Aram. [[אֱנׇשׁ]], 0no4o0 (coll.), Nab. [[אנוש]] Palm. [[אנש]] Sab. [[אנס]] DHM:ZMG 1883, 330, also Ar. na0sun As. nišu, people, & cf. tenišêtu, humanity, human race, v. COT:Gloss sub [[אנשׁ]] & [[נשׁ]] & Hpt:KAT 2.497)—abs. Is 8:1 +; cstr. Je 20:10; —
of individ. Job 5:17, Job 13:9, Ps 55:14, cf. Is 13:12 (‖[[אָדָם]]) Is 56:2 (‖[[בֶּן־אדם]]; Je 20:10 [[שְׁלֽמִי]] ´[[א]] man of my peace, i.e. my friend.
coll. men Is 24:6, Is 33:8, Is 51:7, Ps 66:12; = men in general; ordinary men Ps 73:5 cf. ´[[חֶרֶט א]] i.e. a common stylus Is 8:1 (v. [[אַמַּת אִישׁ]] De 3:11).
